---
description: Add a feature with minimal process overhead.
agent: Ask
model: GPT-5.3-Codex
---

Use `Orchestrator` in direct-first mode for feature work.

Checklist:
1. Confirm scope and acceptance criteria.
2. Determine if OpenSpec proposal is required.
3. Implement with minimal edits.
4. Run targeted validation.
5. Update docs/changelog only where impacted.
